// src/components/ApplyForm.js
import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ApplyForm=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',aadhaar:'',address:''});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/apply',formData);alert("Application submitted successfully!");}catch(error){console.error(error);alert("Submission failed");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-4 mx-auto",style:{maxWidth:'500px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-4 text-center",children:"Apply Form"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",className:"form-control",onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Aadhaar Number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"aadhaar",className:"form-control",onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"address",className:"form-control",onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-success w-100",children:"Submit"})]})]});};export default ApplyForm;
